definition.name: user-group-dn
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLRSERVB.idmresource.NOVLRSERVBDriverOptionPrompts.gcv.dscr.user-group-dn)The slash-form DN container root that will be serviced by the roles driver.

definition.name: uad-dn
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLRSERVB.idmresource.NOVLRSERVBDriverOptionPrompts.gcv.dscr.uad-dn)The slash-form DN of the User Application Driver object that is hosting the role system.

definition.name: user-app-url
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLRSERVB.idmresource.NOVLRSERVBDriverOptionPrompts.gcv.dscr.user-app-url)The URL used to connect to the User Application in order to start Approval Workflows.

definition.name: user-app-identity
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLRSERVB.idmresource.NOVLRSERVBDriverOptionPrompts.gcv.dscr.user-app-identity)The LDAP DN of the object used to authenticate to the User Application in order to start Approval Workflows.

definition.name: user-app-password
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLRSERVB.idmresource.NOVLRSERVBDriverOptionPrompts.gcv.dscr.user-app-password)The password used to authenticate to the User Application in order to start Approval Workflows.
